amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to enforce the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit in the case of Glassroth v. Moore dealing with a display of the Ten Commandments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enforce the judgement of the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit in Glassroth v. Moore, decided July 1, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 161 (Roll no. 419).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Hostettler.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 161 (Roll no. 419).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
